segments.text: Now that it ’ s the new year , I ’ Ve decided to turn over a new leaf .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah ? You finally decided to wipe the slate clean ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You got it ! I have a new job , I ’ m living in a new city , with new friends ! This is my opportunity to make some small changes in the way I live my life .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So what are you going to do ? Take up an art class or something ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , first of all , I ’ Ve decided to stop smoking . It ’ s not that I ’ m pinching pennies or anything , it ’ s just that I ’ Ve been smoking since I was sixteen , and I think it ’ s time to stop .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m with you on that one . Anything else you ’ re planning on doing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One last thing , I ’ Ve decided to come out of the closet .
segments.speaker: S1
